meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7960.

td.p: Andrew Simmons, a grants and contracts reviewer from Lilburn, Georgia
Natasha Leyk, a budget manager from Chicago, Illinois
Steven Grade, a sports industry consultant from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $57,201)

tr.td: THE ZODIAC, KINDA IN PICTURES
LITERARY GENRES
AD SLOGANS
NOUNS THAT ARE ALSO VERBS
CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST
(Alex: Name the continent for us.)
FOLLOWING SPORTS RELIGIOUSLY

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: He wasn\'t always well-behaved. Told a lot of lies.)
...

NatashaWhat is Peter Pan?
$7,400
AndrewWhat is Little Lord Fauntleroy?
$12,000
StevenWhat is The Velveteen Rabbit
$10,801
Pinocchio')
